field.description: Select the interfaces that LADVD will bind to. You can use the CTRL or COMMAND key to select multiple interfaces.

The management interface for this host. Addresses on this interface are auto-detected (IPv4 and IPv6). This must be a physical interface, not a VLAN, LAGG, or other abstracted type.
Specify the physical location of the host.
